Class TUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.View.TUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI
public class TUI extends Object implements UI
The TUI class represents the Textual User Interface for the Galaxy Trucker game. It implements the UI interface and provides methods to interact with the game through a text-based interface.
